description: A non linear shunt compensator bank or section admittance value.

contents.name: NonlinearShuntCompensator
contents.description: Non-linear shunt compensator owning this point.

contents.name: b
contents.description: Positive sequence shunt (charging) susceptance per section

contents.name: b0
contents.description: Zero sequence shunt (charging) susceptance per section

contents.name: g
contents.description: Positive sequence shunt (charging) conductance per section

contents.name: g0
contents.description: Zero sequence shunt (charging) conductance per section
